meta.content: Fairfield Community School District - Fairfield Schools COVID-19 Current Information and Planning

Parent and Student Update 4/20/2020
Building administrators are working on a plan for families to get supplies from buildings. Please be patient as we work out the details. At this point, we will continue to keep the buildings closed and only allow a few in the building at one time.
Teacher of the Year Information
Would you like to nominate a teacher? Now is the opportunity.
Teacher of...

meta.name: viewport
meta.title: Fairfield Community School District - Fairfield Schools COVID-19 Current Information and Planning

div.em: Current conditions as of 22 Apr 06:55 am CDT

div.div: A 30 percent chance of showers before 10am. Partly sunny, with a high near 73. Breezy, with a southwest wind 10 to 15 mph increasing to 15 to 20 mph in the afternoon. Winds could gust as high as 30 mph.
Mostly cloudy, with a low around 51. South wind 5 to 10 mph.
A 20 percent chance of rain after 1pm. Partly sunny, with a high near 68. Southeast wind 5 to 10 mph becoming north in the morning.

div.h3: Fairfield Schools COVID-19 Current Information and Planning

p.b: Building administrators are working on a plan for families to get supplies from buildings. Please be patient as we work out the details. At this point, we will continue to keep the buildings closed and only allow a few in the building at one time.
Would you like to nominate a teacher? Now is the opportunity.

span.b: More of the Team Elite challenges! Thank you all for getting creative and sharing your talents!

a.span: List of Iowa telehealth providers accepting new clients

p.b: Please share with list with your networks and families

We get many requests of mental health providers that are accepting new clients AND using telehealth right now. We put out a call and are excited to share 65 different providers that are anxiously waiting to serve Iowa families.

If you are a school, organization, or business we are asking you to go out of your way to share this list with your families. Often times families may not feel comfortable requesting this information from you, but we know many are desperate to know how to access these resources.
We do not endorse any agency and recognize this is not an exhaustive list.
15,700 Face Shields have been assembled so far by FCSD Staff Members & Friends. Here is a link to a slideshow showing some of these individuals in action:
Thank you for all your work - Great work from our CommunityTeam!

strong.span: Previous Updates (Please Click the Links Below)

p.span: Click the pictures below to see and read some of the highlights from the last year.
